Is this a command?


0

Available Parameters

DiscordJs (discord)

    Discord.js is a JavaScript library for interacting with the Discord API, commonly used to create Discord bots. It's asynchronous, event-driven, and supports features like command handling, rich embeds, and extensibility. Developers use it to build bots that perform various tasks on the Discord platform.

args (...args: any[])

    args is an Array of type any. In this case, it will be filled with the input provided by the user after the command, in the order it was provided.

An overview of the parameters:




function pluginFunction(discord, ...args) {
    // ... YOUR CODE HERE
}
